column1: #CyberpunkisNow The side of a building in China projects the message "Wear a Mask", presumably due to the Coronavirus/Wuhan Pneumonia outbreak, posted by Reddit user Traumlore. https://www.reddit.com/r/UrbanHell/comments/ew3hn0/building_in_china_says_wear_a_mask_due_to_virus/
#CyberpunkisNow A Mcdonald's delivery person in China dressed in pieced together/DIY personal protective gear, presumably due to concerns surrounding Coronavirus. Posted by Reddit user Khysamgathys.
